api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Search Hanime Video with Tags, Brands also You can blacklist tag with this API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hanime-python-api.p.rapidapi.com/search"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hanime-python-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://hanime-python-api.p.rapidapi.com/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hanime-python-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hanime-python-api.p.rapidapi.com/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hanime-python-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
